title: V-Day
description: The clock is ticking and only Vivienne Moore knows when things are set to implode. Knowledge can be power… or in Vivienne’s case, a burden. Since the fateful day that has come to be known as M-Day, she’s been frantically searching for her brothers. Only she knows the truth and will be able to save her family—if she can find them before the countdown hits zero.  But all is threatened when a man from Vivienne’s past interferes with things he doesn’t comprehend. Will she be forced to sacrifice a second chance at love to rescue her brothers? Or will she figure out a way to save everyone?
author: D.T. Dyllin
